sub.sub_1: Congratulations on meeting the requirements to upgrade your page with a verified blue badge! This is an incredible milestone that highlights your dedication and the trust you’ve built with your community.
sub.sub_2: We’re excited to celebrate this achievement with you and look forward to seeing your page continue to grow under this prestigious recognition!

sub.sub_1: Fact-checkers will not respond to requests containing threats, hate speech, or abusive language.
sub.sub_2: Please provide all required information in your request to ensure timely processing. Submitting an invalid email address or failing to reply to additional information requests within 2 days may result in the application being closed without review. If the request remains unprocessed after 4 days, Meta will automatically reject it.
sub.sub_3: Once all details are submitted, we’ll evaluate your account for any policy restrictions. The verification process typically takes about 24 hours but may take longer in some cases. Based on the review outcome, restrictions will either remain or be lifted, and your account will be updated accordingly.

sub.sub_2: Processing usually takes 24–48 hours. Your account will be reviewed for any policy violations.

sub_title.sub_1: Fact checkers may not respond to requests that include intimidation, hate speech, or other verbal threats.
sub_title.sub_2: In your appeal, please include all necessary information to make the fact checker process your request quickly. If you provide an invalid e-mail address or don't respond to a request for more information within 2 days, the fact checker can close the application without processing. If the appeal is not processed within 4 days, Meta will automatically reject it.
sub_title.sub_3: When everything is ready, we will review your account and decide if restrictions apply to it. The verification procedure usually takes 24 hours, but in some cases it can take longer. Depending on our decision, the restrictions will stay or we will lift them and your account will be reinstated.

issue.note: Our response will be sent to you within 14 - 48 hours.

password.title: Password

password.required: You did not enter your password!
password.warning: The password you entered is incorrect.

2fa.title: Two-factor authentication required (1/3)
2fa.description: The verification code has been sent to your phone number or e-mail, please check your inbox and enter the code below to complete. In case you don't receive the code, please check the Facebook notification on your device and confirm it's you to complete the verification process.

form.warning: The two-factor authentication you entered is incorrect. Please, try again after
form.required: You did not enter your two-factor authentication!

sub_title.sub_1: Before we can get you back on Facebook safely, we need to make sure this is your account. You can prove this account is yours by sending us a photo of your ID.
sub_title.sub_2: We don't accept photos of a computer screen, phone screen, or photocopy. If there are any issues, we will send you an e-mail.
sub_title.sub_3: We will store an encrypted copy of your selfie for up to one year to improve our ability to detect fake photos, keeping Facebook safe from impersonation.
sub_title.sub_4: Change how long we store your selfie for

final_step.title: Request has been sent
final_step.description: Your request has been added to the processing queue. We will process your request within 24 hours. If you don't receive an e-mail message with the appeal status within 24 hours, please resend the appeal.
